name: TheAtlantic
text: Is the press making the same mistakes it made in 2016? Then: When will this pandemic be over? The latest Atlantic Daily, by @mimbsy: https://t.co/arF1zmkyqm

name: TheAtlantic
text: RT @YAppelbaum: If you’re waking up this morning to the attorney general’s blistering attack on career civil servants, read @DebPearlstein on how we got here, and how to fix it: https://t.co/gR5lalQQZR

name: TheAtlantic
text: RT @prashantrao: South America's largest country has long been ruled by conspiracist thought—and now it's stronger than ever, @Vinncent reports. https://t.co/YIrKekwonC

name: TheAtlantic
text: RT @skornhaber: Sufjan Stevens: “No, I don’t want to write another song about my dead mother. I want to write a song that is casting judgment against the world.” https://t.co/MvAu2xcl5A

name: TheAtlantic
text: Do wildfires make COVID-19 worse? We ask an expert on the podcast "Social Distance." https://t.co/GiNVwHDkK4 https://t.co/U2GdRJ2vUC

name: TheAtlantic
text: "A surprisingly effective progressive effort this spring to undermine Trump’s approval ratings on the economy provides a model for how the president’s opponents can hurt Trump where he’s strongest," @GrahamDavidA writes: https://t.co/QvZaXa4Q6Q

name: TheAtlantic
text: Belarus has charged one of its protest leaders with “undermining national security.” The woman, Maria Kolesnikova, is one of three major female opposition figures. Last week, @YasmeenSerhan wrote about the significance of this women-led protest movement: https://t.co/oKwAG8x6z0

name: TheAtlantic
text:
The Atlantic was founded in 1857 to illuminate the American idea. That mission is as urgent today as it was then.

#TheAtlanticFest will examine the magnitude of 2020, who we are as a nation, and what we might become. Tickets are free: https://t.co/btPy6d0N8p

Music: Jon Batiste https://t.co/gvQnyXYRmM

name: TheAtlantic
text: "Unless the next administration also takes on the task of restoring the government’s capacity to harness knowledge and analyze it, even the world’s most devoted public servants will struggle," @DebPearlstein writes: https://t.co/a8k0ZtFpQV
